object.name: objTest
object.code:
x = math.random(10) y = math.random(10) index = 0 audio_play(musicWater, true)
function update() if(key_down("up")) then y = y - 1 end if(key_down("down")) then y = y + 1 end if(key_down("left")) then x = x - 1 end if(key_down("right")) then x = x + 1 end
if(key_pressed("e")) then audio_play(sfxCoin, false) end
if(key_pressed("f")) then audio_stop(musicWater) end index = index + 0.1 end
function draw() draw_sprite(playerRun, index, x, y) end
